act:act.act:prerevisednote: Despite the above date, the Schedule to the Act, including the Map of Nisg̱a'a Lands and the Appendices, is current to May 11, 2000. See "Amending Agreements" for amendments to the Schedule.
act:act.act:title: Nisg̱a'a Final Agreement Act
